website_summaries.verdict: All the hydration you'd expect from a lip balm with the pigmentation of a lipstick.
pros: Creamy formula goes on smooth, keeping lips soft and hydrated all day
Available in a wide range of highly pigmented shades
Color lasts for hours without smearing or looking cakey
cons: Color wears off easily when eating or drinking

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice formula and very shiny on my lips. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Golden Grapes
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful color. I saw it in the store and bought it online because the color is NOT as pictured in real life. The quality is also quite decent for the price especially. It is hydrating and soft with no annoying taste or ordor.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Moisturization is the key!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I swear by L'Oreal Colour Riche lipstick! As you can see in the pics, my lips are well moisturized when I wear it, I've also been known to throw some sparkles on it and dazzle people with it that way. This lipstick is by far, the best I've ever used, which is why it's my "go-to" for over five years now. I love it and you will too, if you try it. The colors are true to match and the lasting time is amazing. Plus, it moisturizes your lips, did I mention that??? Lol...have fun with the variety of colors they offer!
customer_reviews.author: candice sacco

customer_reviews.title: Good shade for both office/parties
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful for dusky skin. But the only drawback of the lipstick is it doesn't stays long on the lips even after applying concealer and lining the lips with lip liner. I would have loved it more if the color has been bit darker. Good for office wear. But if you want to wear it for parties you might have to apply it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting, Lush Texture in a Cheerful Red
customer_reviews.text: Buying lipstick online is a bit bizarre but I was looking for a true red and this lipstick was on sale so, why not? Ends up it's a gorgeous color. L'Oreal lipsticks, in general, are divine so I knew that I wasn't going to be disappointed with the feel. I've found that if I stain my lips lightly then go in with a thicker coat the lipstick more reliably stays on for half the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tassie Wussell

customer_reviews.title: Nude color - not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered nude for office looks. The packaging was good and arrived as estimated( though long delivery date).The color stick looked good. I tested on my hand and color looked fine.But when applied on my lips, I did not find it giving that much great color. Also, lip lines are visible so clearly. I feel this color would look fine on extremely fair people.I was so desperate to have if but now disappointed. The lipstick is moist though. But you need to keep re-applying after every 2-3 hrz to keep the color and feel of a lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Upasana

customer_reviews.title: My all time Favorite brand and shade.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this for years. My perfect shade in Mica. FYI For those who also wear this shade Maybelline lip liner( 05 Rose) is that perfect color complement for this shade.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color!
customer_reviews.text: I like pinkish/red tone but not too red and I've gone through quite a few purchases only to find that it does not look very nice - too red or too dry or not enough color but this color is Fabulous!!!! Love Love Love this color! I don't wear tons of make up or foundation but I like lipstick and this color is just right, easy to apply, hydrating but yet lasts for awhile! Thank you for this beautiful color...no more wasting money :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lauletta

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but it's too matte for me. My lips don't feel as moist, and it really makes the wrinkles show up around my lips. Think they call that bleeding? At any rate, I've not noticed this with other lipsticks. I'm wondering if the product is an old one, and maybe that is why it seems so dry.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Color in Pic Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: It's much lighter than what Amazon pic shows. Not the brown shade that's depicted. More of a nude shade. Nice, but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: LS Amzn

customer_reviews.title: L’Oréal lipstick is the ONLY lipstick for me!
customer_reviews.text: Besides a little lip gloss to top my lipstick sometimes, I only use Loreal’s lipstick because it is so moist and the colors are so realistic and flattering. I use two colors together to get the perfect shimmer and shade and I don’t need lipgloss with these. I buy in duplicates so I can always have them in my purse and at home. No other lipstick even comes close to measuring up and I’ve tried the expensive brands. L’Oréal is good quality makeup at an affordable price. My lips don’t hold onto lipstick very long though so I have to reapply it a lot but i don’t mind a fresh coat when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Emmie B Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Purple/blue tones
customer_reviews.text: Based on the color swatches on Amazon and other websites I ordered this lipstick in Mica and Blushing Berry. Both are too purple and do not look anything like the pictures or swatches. L’Oreal lipstick is creamy, moisturizing and smells great. I’ve ordered several lipsticks from Amazon and for the most part they are true to the colors in the pictures. These were a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great inexpensive lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. It is cheap, moist, color is perfect and best part is that L"Oreal doesn't use animals to test their products. I spent so much money on high end lipstick and I like this better and I can get five of these compared to one of the high end brands. I bought four different colors. If you are one to mix your colors these blend really well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Moen

customer_reviews.title: Stick to it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my old stand-by color. I have four friends now who also wearing it, after they have asked me what color and brand it is!!!! It's not too dark and not too light and not too bright, kind of just right, especially for those of us over 40. I don't want to here "Here comes Boo's lips".
customer_reviews.author: recipeweakness

customer_reviews.title: Great formula and color
customer_reviews.text: I love this formula and this color (Peach Fuzz). I almost never wear it alone because it’s too light for me. I have red hair and very pale skin so by itself it makes me look like a corpse. It is a very pale golden peach. However I love it over other colors. I’ll apply red or berry lightly and then apply this over it and it adds such beautiful dimension and shine without being too shimmery. I wear it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: KristenTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lippie!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a matte lipstick, which is good, because I look AWFUL in the matte lipsticks that are so popular now. This is a lovely rise pink with a bit of a golden glow about it. Lovely shade! (My complexion is light olive, with dark brown hair and green eyes. It's a very flattering shade!)
customer_reviews.author: S. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this color!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this color when I first saw it on Amazon! Its moisturizing & the color is not real bold, but just right! It has some shimmer but not over powering. Like all lipsticks except for lip stains, it does need to be reapplied after drinking & eating. This color is definitely one of my very favorite!! I've used this brand many times over the yrs! I recommend this color & brand to everyone! I will definitely buy this color again!
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Normally when I buy lipstick the tube is taped shut, this one wasn't. Not only that, but the lipstick itself was smudged and in light of the current pandemic I will NOT be using this. Honestly, I can't tell if this wasn't previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Really Dark!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the texture and saturation, but the color is reeeeeally much deeper than the swatch depicts! Was looking for more of a berry beige, but I will simply reorder in another shade -- this one can be toned down with a top coat of lighter gloss. L'Oreal is a high quality brand, and at 62 years of age, I have been purchasing their products since my early twenties and can always trust their formulas.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. MIller

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and Creamy
customer_reviews.text: I just shopped the Sephora sale before finding this lipstick and I have to tell the world how much I love it!! I purchased the Charlotte Tillbury Kim K for about 3 times the cost and actually like this so much better. It is more moisturizing, soft on the skin, it lasts a long time, and it smells wonderful! Do not think twice!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Coello

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color. Better than Dior.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked this formula. It’s not matte but also not to creamy or greasy. The color is a perfect pink with only a touch of peach to make it fresh. A nice pop of color but not too bright or intense. This color make blue eyes pop. Very similar to Dior 578 but this is longer lasting than Dior Addict formula. Price is way better too.
customer_reviews.author: like to be lazy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this color—very neutral & the lipstick itself is moisturizing ...
customer_reviews.text: L’Oreal Paris Lipstick is one of the only two brands I can use that doesn’t “bleed” on my lip line. I LOVE this color—very neutral & the lipstick itself is moisturizing & stays on pretty well. I’m fairly tough on lipstick & I consider this a good one. I’ve been buying this brand for over a decade now!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Logan

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes well
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick is the perfect color for me, natural and not too bright but still enough color. It is very moisturizing, but doesn't last too long. Best of all, it does not have a strong smell or taste.
customer_reviews.author: AngelBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Pale color
customer_reviews.text: This is a very creamy, moisturizing lipstick but the drawback is the color is very pale. I think it is more like a lipgloss than a lipstick. If you just want to moisten your lips with just a hint of color this is a good choice. If you are looking for a lipstick with more color, then this is not the one.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Meharry

customer_reviews.title: My go to color
customer_reviews.text: This is my new every day color. I have very fair skin and I find a lot of lip colors are too loud on me. This is the perfect nude and I like that it isn’t too pink. Great shade and I feel comfortable and confident wearing it. This lipstick feels moisturizing on my lips. I do have to re-apply several time throughout the day, but this is not advertised as long wear so that’s to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. U

customer_reviews.title: works on lips, lids & cheeks
customer_reviews.text: OMG! i have bought this shade several times it's perfect for me I am a light blonde with fair to medium skin tone heavy pigmented colors just don't look right regardless of the season this tropical pink is perfect 😍
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color. Not pink, not coral, not red, just right. I just re-ordered so I would have a tube for my purse.
customer_reviews.author: beachwine

customer_reviews.title: MY NEW FAVORITE SHADE
customer_reviews.text: My niece from Chicago came to visit and slipped this on before a picture. It looked lovely on her lips. All she did was add a darker lip liner and a little of L'Oreal Bronze Coin. It looked great and we have the same complexion so I knew I would love it. She got hers at Walgreen's for $10. Well I came to Amazon after buying my first tube at Walgreen's. Walmart was out but ordered 3 tubes for me at $5.99. This is now my favorite shade.
customer_reviews.author: LauraEllen

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using lipsticks since my teenage years and every year I try to find the most suitable lipstick for me. It was either this or Maple Kiss. Toasted Cinnamon is slightly orange tinted, not too strong, not too saturated. It's subtle on me since I already have tinted lips. I've been wearing it everyday since I got it. I hope they never discontinue this.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but does not last long
customer_reviews.text: It came damage, I don't know how,but it did, so disappointed, but I can still use it but still color is pretty, but does not last long at all, I just wanted a pretty nude, I guess I will keep looking
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Moisturizing, works better than lipgloss or chapstick!
customer_reviews.text: I love L'Oreal Colour Riche Lipsticks! Stays moist on the lips most of the day, only having to reapply after meals. I've read some complaints from other reviewers about the Caramel Latte not having much of a tint to it, but that's exactly why I love it! I like the nude look on my lips, and this gives just a hint of shading along with a sexy sheen. I've found this brand works so much better than lipgloss for chapstick or keeping my dry chapped lips moisturized for longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Loreal is my favorite lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: First time I've had this color but I love Loreal lipsticks and this one is just as pleasing as the other colors I choose. Rich and creamy with no caking or pealing. Stays on for 3-4 hours before needing touch up. When it does wear off, it doesn't leave that nasty line around your mouth that some other lipsticks do.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: A little sheer but so much awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of loaded pigmentation, you might not love this lipstick. However, I think it's great because it is very natural. You can tell that the color is still there and it complements my skin tone well.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE SUGAR PLUM SHADE!
customer_reviews.text: I have to edit this because they are using the sam review for three different color lipsticks. That’s so unproductive. I don’t understand the logic behind that. This review is for the SUGAR PLUM. I love this color & the photos of it are above. It brightens my face & makes my lips look fuller & shimmery. This color was not flattering on me. It was the Mauve. I have light blonde/silvery gray hair & blue eyes & I’m fair skinned. It was too brownish. It washed me out. Not what I expected. But same great L’Oreal quality. A very good value at this price if this is a good color for you. I hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Light for Me
customer_reviews.text: From the picture, this lipstick seemed like the perfect color for my skin tone (medium brown). In actuality, this shade is a bit lighter than I anticipated. Good quality, but not the best color for me. I will most likely have to mix it with a darker lipstick color in order to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Motley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: I normally would never order a lipstick on line, however this color got a lot of rave reviews. I was in need of a nude looking lipstick for day time wear. When I received it I was pleasantly surprised of what a beautiful nude lipstick. I love the color and is my favorite lipstick. I wouldn't say its long wearing but does provide moisture when first putting it on. I would recommend if you are looking for a light colored lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and long lasting. What witchcraft is this?
customer_reviews.text: This smells lovely, is comparably inexpensive, and nice and moisturizing. I purchased Mica for the millionth time. It wears beautifully and by the end of the day I’m left with a very flattering stain. These are all great lipsticks and amazon seems to have the best prices. Usually when they’re not on sale they can run up to $11 in our local drug stores.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiemae1981

customer_reviews.title: Why was my lipstick tossed into a big box w/o wrapping?
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick, inexpensive and very flattering. Very natural and not over done, i will purchase again. However, Amazon needs to understand this item is a cosmetic and should never be tossed into a big box with other items without any type of wrapping at all. Twice now, I almost didn't see it. It's a bit off putting.
customer_reviews.author: FH-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Love this color
customer_reviews.text: I really like this color on me! I put a little bit of gloss on top of the lipstick, just as an extra touch!
customer_reviews.author: carolyf

customer_reviews.title: Smooth application nice pigmented color
customer_reviews.text: I have pale skin and red hair and purchased the color cinnamon toast. It matches great with my hair. I used a lip brush to apply to make sure I had nice clean lines when applying this. It applied smoothly and looks very flattering on my skin tone!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Moore

customer_reviews.title: Creamy, long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I am having difficulty finding this color locally so I was thrilled to find it on Amazon. I ordered 6! This is the color lipstick I wear frequently. Flattering to my skintone. Always creamy, keeps lips from chapping, doesn't have to be reapplied constantly like some lipsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Angel's Helper

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. This is not the original formula! This new Golden Grape is much darker than the original and doesn’t have the slight shimmer that the original had. The original formula is on the left in both pics. Loreal should rename a product when they make a change
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Great Pricepoint and Quality Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Typical Loreal product providing a nice even lip shade with no runs or seepage into fine lines. The color I chose was darker than I normally wear and was beautiful. It was moist for hours and didn't leave too much behind on my glass. Easily removed with makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Yoda68

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and the texture!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite colors and brands! It goes on smooth and stays on well. Does not leave my lips feeling dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color
customer_reviews.text: Flattering color, and smells Good! It’s a lipstick so it does wear off but not as quickly as you would think. You don’t need to use much at one time, so it will last me a long time. It really depends on if you chew or lick your lips a lot. I will but again.
customer_reviews.author: Dashia Lovvorn

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFF PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I think these are a knock off. The cases are a much brighter, shinier gold than ones I have bought in stores in the past. They also have numbers 20T3000 stamped on them and my old ones do not have any numbers stamped on them. Not sealed either. Scary to use an unsealed item considering the COVID pandemic. Will be returning them. Guess I get to wait in line to return them. Waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Joni E.

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy more
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand and color for twenty years at least, goes with anything have, feels like lip balm only more comfortable !!! Hard to find this mid range color, and the price is awesome! I highly recommend. Please don't discontinue this product, L'Oreal !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipstick for years!
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to find this on Amazon because I couldn't find it in the stores. It's my absolute favorite color and this lipstick smells so good when you are putting it on. Very moisturizing and lasts pretty good, I reapply twice throughout the day but my lips never get dry with it on. I love the color on me, and have had a hard time finding other lipsticks to match up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not complimentary to my fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m very fair skinned. You can see in the photo above that this lip color hardly shows on my hand, and my hand is a bit darker than my face, if you can believe that. It doesn’t suit me at all. It is so difficult to buy complimentary lipsticks online. It’s about as difficult as buying jeans that fit. I should just bite the bullet and go to someplace where I can actually test lipsticks. I used to have a Sephora store nearby, but now I live outside a small town, and I am not sure there is such a thing within 100 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Sandstone and Mica are the best colors
customer_reviews.text: i wear two colors of lipstick and that is it. sandstone and mica. these are my go to lipsticks now for well over 5 years now.
customer_reviews.author: C. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Best drugstore lipstick!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 25 years. I love the creaminess and the fact that, as it ages, it doesn't start to smell rank. My mother used Hazel Bishop and by the time hers were half used, they'd already started to smell strong. No thanks!
customer_reviews.author: milligi

customer_reviews.title: It's okay...
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time reading various reviews on this product and ultimately decided to buy it. I tend to have dry lips and most of the reviews indicated that this lipstick does not contribute to the dryness. I bought the spiced cider color which I absolutely love. It's a dark, pinkish, purple/brownish color that is subtle against my medium brown skin tone. I do like it, but I'm giving it 4 stars because it fades quickly. It is definitely not long lasting but at least it doesn't leave my lips more dry similar to other lipsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Navarro

customer_reviews.title: too light ..very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: color so light can hard to even see it notice it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda ennis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don't usually buy good lipstick. I have a drawerful of junk from the drug store. All I can say is, what a difference! I am sold on L'oreal. The color is beautiful and it glides on so smooth that I am done with buying cheap lipstick. I even love the fragrance. This is the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G.

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I assumed the "divine wine" shade was a deep red; that's my fault. It isn't. It's actually mauve. Very moisturizing, but because of that it's not very pigmented.
customer_reviews.author: Phylicia

customer_reviews.title: Great color and coverage
customer_reviews.text: Great color and coverage. Some lipstics are a little too sheer. Seems a little drying but to be fair I always think that of any lipstick because I usually prefer a tinted lip balm. This matte lipstick is a nice polished look for the office. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Bronzy light lip color
customer_reviews.text: I bought Sandstone. The color in the photo caused me to expect a darker bronze-colored lip color but it is actually quite light and neutral-looking. It applies smoothly and looks natural with a frosted type of appearance. I would have preferred something a little darker but this is nice too. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: am old lady who only wears chapsticks bought this lipstick and am SO HAPPY! smooth and very pretty, will certainly choose other shades in the future!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie shelofsky

customer_reviews.title: Cinnamon Toast
customer_reviews.text: This might be my favorite lipstick brand. It moisturizes and smells great, and it stays on pretty well. I can usually eat a meal and drink something without it fading, but it will start fading after a certain point. It's the perfect fall red, because it's definitely on the red side once applied -- but in all the good, vintage ways, without any of the clown red elements.
customer_reviews.author: emily gazelka

customer_reviews.title: Decent color, not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: It's very close to Mac's blankety. A tad more coral, I wish it was a bit more mauve. It goes on creamy but it does dry out, my lips don't flake or crack but it's just not real long lasting. I probably won't order it again but I'm pretty fair skinned & lipsticks tend to want to go orangie on me. This doesn't go orange like some but personally I do wish it was just a degree more pink.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the quality and color of this lipstick. Goes on smooth and stays put. Trying three different colors and all three are great. I used the 'try on' option and that helped me determine which ones to buy for my dark olive tone skin.
customer_reviews.author: DBHawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick
customer_reviews.text: It is a very rich yet moist on my lips. I use it with a lip liner and sometimes put the liner on my whole lip as a base. When I put the lipstick on top it lasts even longer. Coral is one of my favorite colors and this is a really pretty one.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Welborn

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed Product is Unsanitary
customer_reviews.text: Did not use as product was not sealed upon arrival. Was returned.
customer_reviews.author: C. Keller

customer_reviews.title: TRY IT - Great money value!
customer_reviews.text: I could not find this color anywhere that I bought a long time ago. Only wore on special occasions since I didn't want to use it all. Now, I have plenty! I love this neutral color as it goes well with my skin tone. Hydrating, too! Great product for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: J & J

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COLOR-MOISTURIZING AND CREAMY
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick--fairest nude. It's creamy, moisturizing and natural looking. Have been using it for many years and plan to continue. Also use saucy mauve, another great color. They are both easy to pair with a lipliner. Very satisfied with the product and highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: This is very moisturizing for my lips. The color for me is a little too nude, yet pigmented, I feel the need to mix a darker color with this one. It isn't long lasting, you will need to reapply throughout the day. I read it is flattering on many skin tones, but just not mine. I like L'Oreal products especially their lipsricks and their true match foundations.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Lovely rich color that applies easily
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear much makeup but I do love to wear lipstick on a regular basis. I love this color (fairest nude)...it is light and gives a "bare" look with a sheen to it. The color is rich and applies nicely and easily. Overall I recommend this color and this brand and will be purchasing some more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Hiscock

customer_reviews.title: Good lipstick, color is off
customer_reviews.text: I like the lipstick itself. Has an odor though- not bad, but kinda strong. My gripe is the color. Way more brown than I expected or like (and I used the photo function to see how it would look on me). I haven’t looked to see if it’s returnable- I’ve tried pairing it with other lipsticks since I can’t leave the house with just this color on. It’s hard to rate the longevity of the product since I wear it in conjunction with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Shazz

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I love this color, but they don't sell it in the stores anymore. I was so excited to find it on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Chatelle

customer_reviews.title: Dead on
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to apply and dry as dust . If you want to actually rock the look of “ gloriously , painfully dry chapped lips”, this is the product to buy . In other words , it’s ugly lipstick . It will make you look older. It screams dehydration . You’ll need a lot of balm to get your lips back.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Pie

customer_reviews.title: Timeless color & moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this lipstick and color for about 20 years, tried others, but keep coming back. Best combination of rich color and moisture that I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Elize

customer_reviews.title: Healing powers
customer_reviews.text: A great moisturizing lipstick that actually has staying power. It really feel great on chapped lips and the whole line in various colors does just as well
customer_reviews.author: John of Ft Worth

customer_reviews.title: One tube defective
customer_reviews.text: My wife didn't discover this until the return window had closed but one of the two lipsticks wouldn't twist up out of the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Ed (left the snow belt)

customer_reviews.title: So happy to find Mica color!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the Moonlit Mica color, but it was discontinued. I was so happy to find that L'Oreal now has another Mica, and I snatched it up and love it almost as much as the Moonlit Mica.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Pink Nude Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE this pink-nude lipstick. I saw it feature in Oprah magazine July issue. So, I ordered it from Amazon. The color is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I really like these lipsticks. Saucy mauve is my favorite and I also ordered a couple of the reds bc they were at a low price and I enjoy the mauve one so much. The taste isn't my favorite,but they're super moisturizing. They stay for a good amount of time before reapplying.
customer_reviews.author: Kady

customer_reviews.title: My signature lip color!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! If L'Oreal ever discontinued this product, I would go to Paris and protest (LOL!). This color also looks good on ANY skin tone. I put it in Christmas gift bags in 2015 and it looked good on 3 women of different ethnicities.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand and color!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I run out I buy it again. I couldn’t find it in the store so I came here and found it! Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.author: April Renae

customer_reviews.title: LOreal products are the bomb and so is this lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I wish the color was a little bit more redder for me but it looks nice when Im wearing it. Stays on well as long as your not eating or drinking, which is true for any lipstick...except for those long lasting ones which I don't care for. Product comes out of the tube easily when you turn it and goes on nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Galvin

customer_reviews.title: My lips love this Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. Period It keeps my lips soft and never dries them out. I have 2 favorite shades. 805 Golden Splendor and 135 Ballerina Shoes. They blend together to create a beautiful color and I love wearing each color independently. For my skin tone each is very complimentary. So...soft and moist lips plus wonderful shades pretty much sums up this review! Thanks L'Oreal for making my smile better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lipstick and shade. I wear fairest nude, and I have been using it for years. If you are fair skin, like I am, it is perfect...not too light and not to dark. Enough to give you a beautiful, natural color without looking harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: It's super shiny
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a little sparkly, but it is super super shiny. It's very moisturizing and doesn't smell terrible (The scent reminds me of my 90 y.o. grandmother's powder room). I'll use this for sure, but unless I wish I were warned quite how almost metallically shiny it is.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this lipstick and have used it for years because it goes with everything. The only downside is that it doesn’t last very long and I have to reapply often. I still love it though.
customer_reviews.author: babetsba

customer_reviews.title: Darker shade as shown and not flattering to brown skin tone
customer_reviews.text: The shade Cinnamon Toast is darker than the one shown on the advertisement. It's moisturizing but it wasn't flattering to both light (my mom) and brown complexion (myself). I liked the shade Divine Wine better.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Color looks a little different when applied to lips
customer_reviews.text: This product has a cute golden tube and is a beautiful color.goes on smoothly but is not for every skin tone. It didn't look good on me,a dark skin person.
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: Product as described. Price great. Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: As always, I have worn this color for years. It works every time! I order from same person. Better the retail price!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thommygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Lipstick!~ 💄
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick!~ The colors are great for me. I use a plum or a lava brick color. It seems that you can always find what you need in this lipstick, color n moisture. The right amount of moisture helps it to glide on very easy~👌👍
customer_reviews.author: S. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Most of the time it's a great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure when this became defective (at the warehouse or upon delivery) but I thought I could still use it. That is not the case. Every time I try to wear it my lips look chunky and clumpy. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price. Shear and smells funny.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that these colors would be too dark for me, but they are very shear. My photo is three or four coats and pictures taken with and without flash of the tubes I bought. Someone said they smelled good, but I disagree. I don’t think I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: CA Family

customer_reviews.title: L'Oreal Hydrating Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This Hydrating Lipstick by Loreal has been my go to brand for lipstick. Love the rich colors, feels very creamy and moisturizing on lips and is long lasting. Alway have found colors that work for me and keeps my lips hydrated without using lip balm etc.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Over all great product, but might be lighter than picture.
customer_reviews.text: a little annoyed because shopping for lipstick online is hard, but I gave it stars because it's a quality product. I'm just annoyed because the pink is a little too light and frosty, and the picture is the color I was going for. however, nothing a little dark pink lip liner cant fix
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Unflattering On Me
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a cheaper substitute for my favorite MaryKay lipstick, but was disappointed that this lipstick was just okay. It is definitely a true nude, maybe even a tad lighter than my natural lip color. I wasn't looking for anything wild, but this seemed bland and boring to me. Wasn't crazy about the texture or plastic-y scent either.
customer_reviews.author: Tahlia Merrill Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Lasting Color
customer_reviews.text: Needed this lipstick color for a theater production. The show ran short of 2 hours and the lipstick was long lasting and the color popped on the stage. It was a 1940 time frame for the show and this color had the classic vintage look for the show!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: My BFF’s fav lipstick ... It makes her so happy when i get her this, just as a thoughtful gesture.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected L’Oreal
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, but unfortunately that’s all I can say that is good about this lip color. It does not stay on any more than 10 minutes and fades
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine G Binkley

customer_reviews.title: Great lipstick and subscribe and save makes it very affordable
customer_reviews.text: O love L-Oreal lipstick and this price is incredible! By adding it to subscribe and save I got it at a teriffic price! I find this brand to be far superior to others I've tried, non irritating, lasts an adequate amount of time and always looks and feels great. It's worth paying more for, but with the amazon subsribe and save feature I don't have to!
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: stays on well
customer_reviews.text: so glad I found this as I can no longer find the shade in other stores. It is a very light shade that stays on well, considering I drink fluids throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lipstick for it's quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Colour Riche moisturizing lipstick wears longer than many I have tried and never dries my lips even in winter! They are pigmented perfectly for the average user and do not have a weird taste or unpleasant smell like many of the inexpensive lipsticks do sometimes. It is currently the only lipstick that I regularly purchase for it's quality and value!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 80-something yr old grandma. It made her look fabulous. Very flattering. Loved the color. I do not wear makeup, but she let me test it out. It was very smooth and moist on the lips. Very nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Never consistent
customer_reviews.text: I have worn rapture raisin colored lipstick for years. All of a sudden sometimes I buy it and it’s the right color and other times like today it arrives has rapture raisin on it but totally different color. More of a red. So frustrating it’s not consistent
customer_reviews.author: Kate Cleveland

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Colour Riche Lipcolour, Fairest Nude, 1 Count
product_meta.description:
Style:NUDES| Color:Fairest NudeIndulge in richness beyond compare with L'Oreal Paris Lipstick from Colour Riche. Colour Riche Lipstick contains nourishing ingredients like Omega 3 and Vitamin E, plus the lipstick is enriched with Argan Oil to condition and soften lips. Your lips are kept soft, smooth, and ultra-hydrated. With a spectrum of gorgeous satin shades from bold to nearly nude, Colour Riche Lipstick offers a lip color that's perfect for every look and any occasion. • Rich color, hydrating lipstick • With Omega 3, Vitamin E and Argan Oil • Keeps lips soft, smooth and supple • Creamy satin color Apply starting in the center of your upper lip. Work from the center to outer edges of your lips, following the contour of your mouth. Then glide across the entire bottom lip.

BRAND STORY
By L'Oreal Paris
feature_bullets: COLOUR RICHE LIPCOLOR: Indulge in richness beyond compare with our most luxuriously rich color and hydration. Colour Riche Lipstick is enriched with nourishing ingredients like Omega 3, Vitamin E, and Argan Oil to soften lips

GORGEOUS HYDRATING LIP COLOR: Keep lips soft, smooth, and ultra hydrated with Colour Riche Lipstick. Choose from a spectrum of show stopping shades, for lasting, creamy color that delivers intense hydration

L'OREAL PARIS LIPSTICKS: Whether you want a bold red lipstick or the perfect nude, you can choose a color for every occasion. Choose matte lipstick for highly pigmented shades or choose creamy lipstick colors for smooth, soft and hydrated lips

BECAUSE YOU'RE WORTH IT: L'Oreal Paris Makeup helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, brow pencils, eye shadow palettes, lipsticks and much more
PERFECT TO PAIR WITH: L'Oreal Paris Colour Riche Lip Liner, a creamy lip liner to perfectly define and contour lips

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
